All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
GUI_for_menus
The GUI_for_menus class provides the graphical user interface for managing investments.
Investment
The Investment class represents a financial investment with a symbol, name, quantity, price, and book value.
MutualFunds
The MutualFunds class represents a mutual fund investment.
Portfolio
The Portfolio class is the main class that interacts with the user to perform various operations like buying, selling, updating, getting gain, and searching investments.
Stock
The Stock class represents a stock investment.
